definitions.body: judge (cf. Ar. da0na intrans. to be obedient, submissive, trans. requite, compensate, rule, govern, diynun obedience, abasement, recompense, day=a0nun requiter, governor, madiynah;un city; As. dânu, Impf. idin, judge Asrb:Ann. x. 120 Dl:HA 49; Aram. [[דִּין]], down judge, exercise judgment, punish, [[דַּיׇּינׇא]], dayono0, judge, [[דִּינׇא]], dyn judgment, mdiyto0 city;—on √ [[י]]“[[ע]] v. Nö:ZMG 1883, 533), syn. [[שָׁפַט]]—

act as judge, minister judgment, of God [[ידין עמוֹ]] De 32:36 (poet. = Ps 135:14) Ps 50:4; [[דין עמים]] Ps 7:9, Ps 96:10, Is 3:13; [[יׇדִין]] [[לְאֻמִּים בְּמֵישָׁרִים]] Ps 9:9; Messianic king Ps 72:2.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of men, usu. c. acc. cogn., [[אֵין־דָּן דִּינֵךְ]]

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: there is none to plead thy cause Je 30:13; [[דִּין יׇתוֹם]] ´[[ד]] plead cause of orphan Je 5:28; [[דין עני ואביון]] ´[[ד]] Je 22:16; also, acc. cogn. om., Pr 31:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God, [[דָּנַנִּי אֱלֽהִים]] God has pled my cause Ge 30:6 (E).

execute judgment, vindicate, in battle against enemies, [[דָּן יׇדִין עַמּוֹ]] Dan will judge (vindicate as a warrior) his people (v. Di) Ge 49:16 (poet.); the Messianic king [[בגוים]] Ps 110:6; God, [[בִּגְבוּרָֽתְךָ תְדִינֵנִי]] in thy might judge me (vindicate me) Ps 54:3.

execute judgment, requite, of man, [[דִּינוּ לַבּׂקֶר מִשְׁפָּט]] execute judgment every morning Je 21:12; of God, upon Egypt Ge 15:14 (E); [[עמים]] by means of powers of nature Job 36:31; [[אפסי ארץ]] 1Sa 2:10 (poet.)
govern, [[אַתָּה תָּדִין אֶת־בֵּיתִי]] thou shalt govern my house Zec 3:7.
[[לאׁ־יוּכַל לָדִין עִם]] he cannot contend with one mightier than he Ec 6:10.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[וַיְהִי כָל־הָעָם נׇדוֹן בְּכָל־שִׁבְטֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל]] and all the people were at strife throughout all the tribes of Israel 2Sa 19:10 (reciprocal, cf. Dr.)

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: Note.—[[לאׁ־יׇדוֹן רוּחִי בָֽאָרָם לְעׂלָם]] Ge 6:3 is difficult. (1) LXX Vulgate SyrVer Onk rd. [[ידיר]] or (Kue) [[ילון]] abide in, dwell,—My spirit will not abide in man for ever; this best suits the context, but [[ידור]], as Aramaism, is dub. (2) Kn De Schr RVm render rule in, supported by Zec 3:7 only. (3) Thes Ew Di render be humbled in, sustained by Ar. usage, but not by Heb. (4) strive with of AV RV (cf.
